LanguageData.Difficulty_AnomalyThreats_Info: Adjust the percentage of major threats that will be Anomaly-related.
LanguageData.Difficulty_AnomalyThreatsInactive_Info: Adjust the percentage of major threats that will be Anomaly-related when the monolith is not active. Only certain minor Anomaly incidents can occur when the monolith is inactive.
LanguageData.Difficulty_AnomalyThreatsActive_Info: Adjust the percentage of major threats that will be Anomaly-related when the monolith is active. With the current settings:\n - {0} of major threats will be Anomaly-related at monolith level 1 and 5\n - {1} of major threats will be Anomaly-related at monolith levels 2-4
LanguageData.Difficulty_StudyEfficiency_Info: Add a multiplier to how much research is gained when studying unnatural entities.
LanguageData.Difficulty_ChildShamblersAllowed_Info: Reanimated child shamblers will sometimes appear.
LanguageData.ChooseAnomalyPlaystyle: Choose how you'd like to integrate Anomaly horror into your game:
LanguageData.CanBeEditedInStorytellerSettings: Update Anomaly storyteller settings. These can be modified during the game
